headline: American Water Announces Common Stock Offering with a Forward Component
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., August 04, 2025--American Water Works Company, Inc. (NYSE: AWK) announced today a registered underwritten offering of $1 billion in shares of its common stock. Subject to certain conditions, all shares are expected to be borrowed by the forward purchasers (as defined below) (or their respective affiliates) from third parties and sold to the underwriters and offered in connection with the forward sale agreements described below.

headline: Southern Company Q2 Earnings Beat as Utility Sales Grow
summary: SO beats Q2 earnings estimates and guided for EPS of $1.50 for the September quarter.
